verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* asked, “\w Is|strong="H3426"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*. \w They|strong="H7586"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* inquired, “\w Are|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H5650"\w* am \w your|strong="H1732"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1004"\w* replied.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* asked, “\w Is|strong="H2617"\w* there anyone \w left|strong="H5750"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* whom \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God?” \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* answered, “There \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w lame|strong="H5223"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* both \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.”

“\w Where|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*?” replied \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* said, “\w Indeed|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Lo-debar|strong="H3810"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Lo-debar|strong="H3810"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w came|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*!” “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1732"\w* replied.

“\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” said \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* grandfather \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w always|strong="H3605"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.”

Mephibosheth \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* said, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* show \w regard|strong="H6437"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w*’s \w grandson|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w belonged|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w work|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* harvest, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* master’s \w grandson|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* master’s \w grandson|strong="H1121"\w*, \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.” \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* ate \w at|strong="H5921"\w* David’s \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s own \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Mica|strong="H4316"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H4186"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* ate \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.
